channel.title: Dockercon 2015 on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Dockercon 2015 on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: a few notes from Dockercon 2015, as seen via Twitter
item.description: The annual conference for Docker, Dockercon, has been going on. A few highlights from the event as seen through Twitter - I was not there to attend it. Docker is real on the Raspberry Pi through support for the ARM processor. Awesome live demo of Docker on a Raspberry Pi by @Quintus23M in the #dockercon closing keynote. pic.twitter.com/DJfBtpcYws — Bridget Kromhout (@bridgetkromhout) June 23, 2015 More details from the presenter, Hypriot-Demo and challenge at DockerCon 2015.
